divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife were showing off our new deck to our friend,we live on top of a hill in East TN and from the deck have a great view of the sky. What we saw was no comet it had not trace of fire behind it and did not fade out it just kept flying across the entire sky until it faded away. The night was clear and you could see all the stars this object was round like a ball and faded off white. The ufo was so high in the sky it looked like it was flying near the stars but the circle was clear enough to see. I wish I could have recorded this because we knew this was not a plane, comet or anything normal it was traveling north west it looked maybe like it was over Ohio going west. This is not a false sighting! I believe we are not alone and the government is keeping this education form us. I sent this info to the ufo hunters on the history channel. I uploaded an image of what it looked like.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Jonesborough
There were no other sightings in Jonesborough on or around April 27th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Faded Circle No Lights it was not bright
